name: applyDamage
description: Applies damage to a target, considering defense.
logic: Subtract amount from target's health, considering target's defense stat.

name: heal
logic: Add amount to target's health, not exceeding max health.

name: applyStatusEffect
description: Applies a status effect to the target.
logic: Add statusEffect to target's status effects with duration.

name: modifyStat
description: Modifies a stat of the target temporarily.
logic: Modify target's stat by modifier for duration turns.

name: fieldHeal
description: Applies passive healing to all allies on the field over a duration.
logic: Each turn, add amount to each ally's health for duration turns, not exceeding max health.

name: cleanseStatus
description: Removes negative status effects from the target.
logic: Remove all negative status effects from target.

name: applyFieldEffect
description: Changes the environmental conditions of the battlefield.
logic: Apply fieldEffect to the battlefield for duration turns, affecting all entities.
